text: The Mérida Cathedral in Mérida, Yucatán, Mexico, is one of the oldest cathedrals in the Americas. ==History== The cathedral was built on the site of Mayan ruins Tiho. ==References== == Other websites == * Descripción del monumento * Category:Roman Catholic cathedrals in Mexico Category:Buildings and structures in Mexico Category:Yucatán (state) Category:Cultural heritage monuments in Mexico
title: Mérida Cathedral
